subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
1. Revised/Updated National Statistical Indicators for Socio-Economic Development Programme and Millennium Development Goals/Viet Nam Development Goals monitoring (2006-2010)  
2. Revised/Updated National Statistical Action Plan (Statistical Action Plan) and Capacity-Building Plan 
3. Data Improved, Harmonised and Rationalised
4. Data Reporting, Communication, Use and Storage Mechanisms Developed and Improved
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.title: Socio-Economic Dev. Monitoring
